definition: first draft/to draw up (a first version)
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate

sentences.english: In addition, AACM is now in the process of drafting safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 另外，民航局现正为安全法规进行法律草拟。

sentences.english: Draft a script to guide your shoot.
sentences.chinese: 草拟一个脚本用于指导你的拍摄。

sentences.english: Our lawyer will draw up the contract today.
sentences.chinese: 我们的律师今天将草拟契约书。

sentences.english: The project team then presents drafted artifacts to the stakeholders.
sentences.chinese: 然后项目团队可以向涉众展示草拟的工件。

sentences.english: Thisdocument is typically drafted and witnessed by an attorney.
sentences.chinese: 这种文件通常是草拟好的，并会由一位律师鉴证。

sentences.english: Xiao Lin , Please draw up a proposal for this Project .
sentences.chinese: 小林，请给我这个项目草拟一份计划书。

sentences.english: I think we can draw up a  tentative plan now.
sentences.chinese: 我认为现在可以先草拟一具临时方案。

sentences.english: Save the drafts as multiple files on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 在电脑中将草拟的合同多保存几个复件。

sentences.english: To screen callers, draw up one-page form for each caller.
sentences.chinese: 为了筛选电话面试者，为每个面试者草拟一份表格。

sentences.english: You need to draw up the training plan for the team and allocate enough time for it.
sentences.chinese: 您需要为团队草拟培训规划并为之分配一定的时间。

sentences.english: The Department of Justice is responsible for drafting legislation in both official languages.
sentences.chinese: 律政司负责以中英两种法定语文草拟法例。

sentences.english: Based on chosen recommendations, draw up detailed transformation plan for the executive team.
sentences.chinese: 基于所选的建议，为执行团队草拟出详细的转换计划。

sentences.english: He has roughed out the article, but he has still to revise it.
sentences.chinese: 他已草拟出这篇文章，但还得加以修改。

sentences.english: Then Lenin renewed his work on the draft programme of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 这时列宁重新开始草拟党纲的工作。

sentences.english: Have your attorney draw up some initial paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 让你的律师草拟一些文件。

sentences.english: Born from the draftsman's table, it has the essence of a finely crafted turntable.
sentences.chinese: 从出生草拟的桌子，它的本质是精雕细琢转台。

definition: to make a draft/to draw up (plans)
to lay out (an argument) item by item/memorandum to a superior
to draft/to draw up/to compose (a plan or document)
memorial to the emperor (folded in accordion form)
rules/regulations/constitution/statute/articles of association (of company)/articles of incorporation/charter (of a corporation)/by-laws
to reach an agreement/to agree upon
